content: 120 mg ZrOCl2·8H2O, 40 mg TCPP, and 1.6 g benzoic acid were dissolved in 8 mL DMF, and then the mixed solution was sonicated for 10 min. After adding 0.8 mg UiO-66­(OH)2 into the solution and sonicating this mixed solution for 20 min, the obtained solution was heated in a muffle furnace at 120 °C for 24 h and then cooled to room temperature. Furthermore, after centrifuging the resulting precipitate with 5000 rpm for 3 min, DMF was used to wash it three times. Then, the solution was centrifuged and finally dried in a vacuum oven.
clean_text:
Synthesis of UiO-66(OH)2@PCN (probe)

120 mg ZrOCl2⋅8H2O, 40 mg TCPP, and 1.6 g benzoic acid were dissolved in 8 mL DMF, and then the mixed solution was sonicated for 10 min. After adding 0.8 mg UiO-66(OH)2 into the solution and sonicating this mixed solution for 20 min, the obtained solution was heated in a muffle furnace at 120 °C for 24 h and then cooled to room temperature. Furthermore, after centrifuging the resulting precipitate with 5000 rpm for 3 min, DMF was used to wash it three times. Then, the solution was centrifuged and finally dried in a vacuum oven.
